io.codeleaf.config.spi

Interface ConfigurationFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConfigurationFactory

    public interface ConfigurationFactory
    The service provider interface for introducing new configuration types.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    tvburger@gmail.com

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Configuration>
      T      		 createConfiguration(Specification specification, Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
      Creates a configuration based on the specified specification.
      <T extends Configuration>
      T      		 createDefaultConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
      Returns the default configuration.
      <T extends Configuration>
      boolean      		 supportsConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
      Returns true if the specified type is supported by this factory, otherwise false
      <T extends Configuration>
      boolean      		 supportsDefaultConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
      Returns true if the specified type is supported by this factory and has a default configuration, otherwise false.

    • Method Detail

      • supportsConfiguration

        <T extends Configuration> boolean supportsConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
        Returns true if the specified type is supported by this factory, otherwise false
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of a configuration
        Parameters:
        configurationTypeClass - the type class of a configuration
        Returns:
        true if the specified type is supported, otherwise false

      • createConfiguration

        <T extends Configuration> T createConfiguration(Specification specification,
                                                Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
                                         throws InvalidSpecificationException
        Creates a configuration based on the specified specification.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the configuration to create
        Parameters:
        specification - the specification to use
        configurationTypeClass - the type class of the configuration to create
        Returns:
        the newly created configuration
        Throws:
        InvalidSpecificationException - if the specification is invalid for the requested configuration type

      • supportsDefaultConfiguration

        <T extends Configuration> boolean supportsDefaultConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
        Returns true if the specified type is supported by this factory and has a default configuration, otherwise false. The default configuration is called when supported and no specification has been found.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of a configuration
        Parameters:
        configurationTypeClass - the type class of a configuration
        Returns:
        true if the specified type is supported and has a default configuration, otherwise false

      • createDefaultConfiguration

        <T extends Configuration> T createDefaultConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
                                                throws ConfigurationNotFoundException
        Returns the default configuration. The default configuration is called when supported and no specification has been found.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the configuration
        Parameters:
        configurationTypeClass - the type class of the configuration
        Returns:
        the default configuration
        Throws:
        ConfigurationNotFoundException - if supportsDefaultConfiguration would return false for the given configuration type
